p: Total viral nucleic acid was extracted from 200 µL of the respiratory samples and 20 µL of Lamda bacteriophage used as the internal control (MS2 for xTAG ®). The extraction was carried out with the QIAamp ®MinElute ®Virus Spin kit (QIAGEN) according to the manufacturer’s specifications. Nucleic acids were stored at 4 °C when processed the same day or stored at −80 °C for later analysis.
